alert.note: Alert for Dawes; North Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 5:54AM CST until December 27 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Dawes County and Northern Sioux County including Harrison, Crawford, and Chadron.. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions continue due to areas of snow and blowing snow that has resulted in icy, snow packed roads.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
